message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM

The paper deals with video captioning, which is a task in computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also mentions the use of recurrent neural networks and reinforcement learning, which are common techniques in natural language processing and machine learning, respectively. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) are also likely sub-categories. Additionally, the paper deals with video data, which falls under the sub-category cs.MM (Multimedia). Finally, the paper proposes a novel approach to training an end-to-end video captioning model, which could fall under the sub-category cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence).
